item.title: Q&A Week 6: Formal Models and Game Theory
item.description: Table of Contents Costs of Voting Can you explain a bit more about the table for costs of voting? Game Theory and Government Shutdown Trump was prolonging the shutdown in order to get funding for the wall, is that a game theory/strategic interaction scenario? Costs of Voting Can you explain a bit more about the table for costs of voting?
